description: Community Mobilization for Poverty Alleviation and Social Inclusion in Service Delivery

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: Reduce extreme poverty and improving income generation and food security among vulnerable groups through community mobilization, agro-based micro-enterprises, skills training and post-training support; and b) promoting social inclusion in the service delivery system through the participation of out of school children; community awareness of maternal and child health; and capacity of service providers in planning and executing community-based water, sanitation and primary health/hygiene schemes.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Community Mobilization
